nodes.text: The Elite Droid 04-A was a model of battle droid that saw use during the Cold War between the reconstituted Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic. Equipped with a blaster pistol, a number of them were deployed to protect the satellite control tower on the Markaran Plains of the planet Balmorra.

Elite Droid 04-As appear as enemies in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, where they can be found in the Markaran Plains as part of the mission "Calling All Droids" in the Imperial version of Balmorra.
